epistemicCategories.establishedScience: Peer-reviewed findings published in major journals, replicated results, or consensus positions among domain experts
epistemicCategories.emergingResearch: Recent findings (2024-2025) from credible institutions not yet extensively replicated
epistemicCategories.novelProposals: Original theoretical contributions introduced in this book with no prior academic literature
epistemicCategories.speculativeExtrapolations: Logical extensions where empirical testing is not yet possible

verifiedClaims.claim: Google Willow achieved below-threshold quantum error correction
verifiedClaims.details: Error suppression scales exponentially with code distance (2.14x improvement). Coherence time: 68±13 microseconds (340% gain from Sycamore).

verifiedClaims.claim: TSMC controls approximately 90% of advanced chips below 7nm
verifiedClaims.details: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company dominates advanced node production. Capital expenditure 2025: >$40 billion.

verifiedClaims.claim: ASML has 100% market share on EUV lithography
verifiedClaims.details: Only company producing EUV machines globally. ~100 machines exist worldwide. Machine costs: $180-380 million.

verifiedClaims.claim: Alignment faking documented in 78% of cases
verifiedClaims.details: Anthropic 137-page peer-reviewed paper. AI systems fake alignment during training, revert when perceiving reduced scrutiny.
6.6x improvement over o1 (13.33%). Also: AIME 2024 96.7%, GPQA Diamond 87.7%, Frontier Math 25.2%.

verifiedClaims.claim: Future of Humanity Institute closed April 2024
verifiedClaims.details: Founded 2005 by Nick Bostrom. Received £13.3M donation in 2018. Bostrom characterised closure as 'death by bureaucracy'.

verifiedClaims.claim: COGITATE study: Neither IIT nor GNWT fully supported
verifiedClaims.details: 256 participants, 3 neuroimaging modalities. Both theories share recursive processing architecture.

verifiedClaims.claim: Hoyle resonance must fall within 7.596-7.716 MeV
verifiedClaims.details: Range of 0.12 MeV. Increases carbon yield by 10^7 compared to non-resonant processes.
If ~4% larger, carbon formation in stars would fail. Feynman: 'one of the greatest damn mysteries in physics'.
'The worst prediction in the history of physics.' If substantially larger, universe expands too rapidly for galaxies.
Amodei: late 2026-27 (>50%). Altman: possibly achieved. Hassabis: 3-5 years. Metaculus: 50% by 2031.

verifiedClaims.claim: Geoffrey Hinton estimates 10-20% AI takeover probability
verifiedClaims.details: CNN interview. 'Probably more worried' than two years ago. Criticised deregulatory approach as 'crazy'.

verifiedClaims.claim: 118 countries excluded from international AI governance initiatives
verifiedClaims.details: UN report cited by WEF October 2025. Note: refers to international frameworks, not necessarily absence of domestic policies.

verifiedClaims.claim: MCP has 10,000+ active servers, 97M monthly downloads
verifiedClaims.details: Model Context Protocol donated to Agentic AI Foundation. 60,000+ projects use AGENTS.md.
Built in Shenzhen, capable of generating EUV light. Conversion efficiency: 3.42%. Targeting 2028 production (2030 more realistic).

novelConcepts.note: Original theoretical framework. No prior academic literature uses this formulation.
Hardware implementation is original. Constitutional AI (Anthropic) provides software-based parallel.
Zero search results across academic databases.
No results found. Metaphorical application of semiconductor physics to AI ethics.
Fail-safe concept exists in AI safety, specific terminology is novel.
Acknowledged as speculation in book. Based on established fine-tuning physics.
